vt_1.name: Verification 1
vt_1.description: checks that all files listed in the compile file has been created

vt_2.name: Verification 2
vt_2.description: check if all of the correlation executes without errors
vt_2.assert: Using device: AMD Ryzen Embedded V1605B with Radeon Vega Gfx

vt_3.name: Verification 3
vt_3.description: check if all of the correlation have the -t function working
vt_3.assert:
Using device: %%
Elapsed time Host->Device: %% milliseconds
Elapsed time kernel: %% milliseconds
Elapsed time Device->Host: %% milliseconds

vt_4.name: Verification 4
vt_4.description: check if all of the fft executes without errors

vt_5.name: Verification 5
vt_5.description: check if all of the fft have the -t function working
vt_5.assert:
Using device: Xavier
Elapsed time Host->Device: %% milliseconds
Elapsed time kernel: %% milliseconds
Elapsed time Device->Host: %% milliseconds

vt_6.name: Verification 6
vt_6.description: check if all of the fft have the -C function working
